verses.verse: Lord <WH3068>, who shall stay <WH1481> in your tabernacle <WH168>? who shall live <WH7931> in your holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>?
He that walks <WH1980> uprightly <WH8549>, and works <WH6466> righteousness <WH6664>, and speaks <WH1696> the truth <WH571> in his heart <WH3824>.
He that backbites <WH7270> not with his tongue <WH3956>, nor does <WH6213> evil <WH7451> to his neighbor <WH7453>, nor takes up <WH5375> a reproach <WH2781> against his neighbor <WH7138>.

In whose eyes <WH5869> a vile person <WH3988> is despised <WH959>; but he honors <WH3513> them that fear <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>. He that swears <WH7650> to his own hurt <WH7489>, and changes not <WH4171>.

He that puts not out <WH5414> his money <WH3701> to usury <WH5392>, nor takes <WH3947> reward <WH7810> against the innocent <WH5355>. He that does <WH6213> these things shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131>.
